Smart AI Chat Library - Your Intelligent AI Conversation Manager
Effortlessly save and organize your valuable AI chat conversations in a structured, easily accessible format. Perfect for researchers, developers, students, and professionals who regularly use AI chat platforms.

Key Features:
✓ One-Click Saving: Floating bookmark button for instant saves
✓ Automatic Categorization: Auto-sorts chats by AI platform (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, etc,..)
✓ Custom Organization: Create personalized folders for better organization
✓ Easy Access: Quick access to all saved conversations
✓ Intelligent Structure: Automatically creates platform-specific folders
✓ Clean Interface: Intuitive and user-friendly design
✓ Drag & Drop: Movable bookmark button for convenience

Perfect for:
- Researchers collecting AI responses
- Developers storing code solutions
- Students saving learning materials
- Writers archiving creative content
- Professionals maintaining reference materials
- Teams sharing AI knowledge bases
